rationale: This referendum aims to to change the configuration of three staking pallets.
details: Approving this referendum will ensure some important changes in the staking process including the fast unstake feature.

rationale: A marketing proposal for a papercraft model of the Kusama logo, including educational files.
details: The request amount is rationale and the idea for papercraft is quite new and can raise awareness.

rationale: This referendum aims to provide funding for the 2nd milestone of PolkaGate extension wallet.
details: The request amount was too high and there already exists a few functional wallets such as Talisman.

rationale: A bounty proposal for creating a ParaSpell XCM SDK & XCM UI spending bounty.
details: ParaSpell focuses on building open-source easy to use XCM SDK & UI tool, which can be beneficial for the ecosystem.
